title: Should You Buy Apple Inc (AAPL) Stock Friday Morning?
text:
Apple Inc (AAPL) is down Friday morning, with the stock losing -0.16% in pre-market trading to 184.07. 


AAPL's short-term technical score of 84 indicates that the stock has traded more bullishly over the last month than 84% of stocks on the market. In the Consumer Electronics industry, which ranks 109 out of 146 industries, the stock ranks higher than 90% of stocks.

Apple Inc has fallen 5.54% over the past month, closing at $192.42 on January 26. During this period of time, the stock fell as low as $181.56 and as high as $194.76. AAPL has an average analyst recommendation of Strong Buy. The company has an average price target of $207.56.





 AAPL has an Overall Score of 67. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on AAPL!
See Full AAPL Report



Apple Inc has a Long-Term Technical rank of 65. This means that trading over the last 200 trading days has placed the company in the upper half of stocks with 35% of the market scoring higher. In the Consumer Electronics industry which is number 131 by this metric, AAPL ranks better than 131% of stocks.



Important Dates for Investors in AAPL:


-Apple Inc is set to release earnings on 2024-05-01. Over the last 12 months, the company has reported EPS of $6.17.


-We do not have a set dividend date for Apple Inc at this time.
